Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps’ men ran out convincing 3-0 victors over Luxembourg in their first fixture of the month, while their upcoming visitors were crushed 4-0 by the Netherlands on Thursday evening.

France have reached three of the last four major tournament finals. They are looking for redemption at these Euros after losing out in the quarter-finals to Switzerland three years ago, before suffering a penalty shootout loss to Argentina at the last World Cup.
Canada will be looking to give the home team a tough challenge as in their first international friendly they got hammered by the Dutch.
The away team don’t have any injury issues going into this game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: France score 3.86 goals when playing at home and Canada score 1.4 goals when playing away (on average).
The winner of their last meeting was France.
When France lead 1-0 at home, they win 100% of their matches.
Others: Tip 1 – Kylian Mbappe to score anytime
Tip 2 – France will win this match
Tip 3 – France to keep a clean sheet
France have 1.20 odds in favour of winning this match, 6.40 odds in favour of the match ending in a draw and the away team have 12.00 odds in favour of them to win this fixture.
Telecast: India: Sony Sports Network, Sony Liv; UK: Premier Sports 1; USA: ESPN, FOX Sports; Nigeria: No Telecast
